rumrider.title: Rum Rider
rumrider.info: Classic mountain rescue concept put upside down.

wolf.title: Wolf Shaman
wolf.info: Fantasy character, hunting for his clan with spells and magic.

flowerrhino.title: Romantic Rhino
flowerrhino.info: Even the strongest creatures can have weak moments.

spiderbulb.title: Spiderbulb
spiderbulb.info: How the spider should be better in attracting flies? Being a lightbulb!

img1.title: Swamp Spawn
img1.info: Late night drawing. Planned to do fast sketch but ended up drawing for 5 hours.

img2.title: Monkey Ninja
img2.info: Practiced lineart work and folds on this one. Was not intended to be a monkey at first, but the ears out of the mask were irresistible.

img3.title: Waterpipe Monster
img3.info: Initial idea here was to have waterpipe/mexican monster with sombrero, but the hat didn't fit the theme I wanted.

img4.title: Peaclock
img4.info: Ok you got the pun here. Clock and peacock together, in a steampunk way. You can check time-lapse of the drawing on

img5.title: Time-warping golem
img5.info: Sometimes we just want to be somewhere else and this guy can come to help.

img6.title: Jetpack Robot
img6.info: Guardian of the skies in metropolitian environments.

img7.title: Zebra-Tiger-Panda
img7.info: Kind of disney style blend of black and white striped animals. The beetle reminded me of an old Lion King videogame.

img8.title: Crazy Bat
img8.info: Sometimes even the darkest things comes out rather cute.

img9.title: Platypus-Lemur
img9.info: He is called Lumir. The idea came from super-fast brainstorming session with my roommates.

img10.title: Young Gecko-Parrot
img10.info: My roommate came up with this one. Even though it's still not as cute as she is, I like the character - gonna make evolved one soon.

img11.title: Alien Invader
img11.info: Very fast drawing. In the middle of the work, Earthworm Jim popped up in my head and I couldn't get rid off it.

ill1.title: Goofy Witch
ill1.info: Drew this one for my ex-stepniece or whatever it's called.

ill2.title: We cheer everywhere!
ill2.info: Design for a t-shirt to use during the ice hockey championship. Can send a photo on an actual person if needed.

ill5.title: Heart, torn out.
ill5.info: Dark moment that I had to put on a paper. Was done in like 5 minutes, just a brainwash, but I still feel the emotions from it.

ill6.title: Blackhole PF 2015
ill6.info: I am also a graphic designer for an indie development team Fiolasoft and I did this during the Chrismas for promotion of our game Blackhole
